entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
